hw1
Class TicketMachine

java.lang.Object
  hw1.TicketMachine

public class TicketMachine
extends java.lang.Object

The class constructs a ticket machine that keeps track of the number of tickets sold and the amount of money collected. It also makes tickets and their prices depending on different parameters including: number of trips, amount desired on ticked, starting zones, and ending zones. Additionally, discounts are included in these calculations, if relevant.

Author:
Michael Lux Section 14 Professor Kautz

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a new ticket machine that has no tickets sold and no money collected

Method Detail

purchaseTicket

public Ticket purchaseTicket(int startZone,
                             int endZone,
                             boolean discounted)
Allows the user to by a ticket based on a desired start zone and end zone. The price will be calculated with a discount if relevant and is in cents.

Parameters:
startZone - the zone that the user want to start the ticket in
endZone - the zone the user wants to end in with the ticket
discounted - whether or not the user has a discount. True if there is and false is there isn't
Returns:
A ticket with the amount for the trip specified by the parameters given, using the TicketUtil.

purchaseTicket

public Ticket purchaseTicket(int numRides,
                             int startZone,
                             int endZone,
                             boolean discounted)
Allows the user to by a ticket based on a desired start zone and end zone and number of trips. The price will be calculated with a discount if relevant and is in cents.

Parameters:
numRides - the number of rides the user wants between two places
startZone - the zone that the user want to start the ticket in
endZone - the zone the user wants to end in with the ticket
discounted - whether or not the user has a discount. True if there is and false is there isn't
Returns:
A ticket with the amount for the trips specified by the parameters given, using the TicketUtil.

purchaseTicket

public Ticket purchaseTicket(int amount,
                             boolean discounted)
Allows a user to purchase a ticket with a desired amount on it. This ticket will also keep tract of a discount for fares if relevant.

Parameters:
amount - the amount (in cents) that is desired to be on the card
discounted - whether or not the user has a discount. True if there is and false is there isn't
Returns:
A ticket with the amount specified.

total number of tickets sold by this machine
